title: Betting Bad-Weather Games, Live Odds, and Week 8 Action
description:
We recap the Falcons-Panthers 'Thursday Night Football' game before getting into how to bet games with bad weather and analyzing some of the juiciest matches to bet against this week, including Ravens-Steelers, Dolphins-Rams, Raiders-Browns, and 49ers-Seahawks.
Hosts: Warren Sharp and Joe House
Learn more about your ad choices. Visit podcastchoices.com/adchoices
